channel.title: Stock Acquisition on FinanClub

item.title: ETRN
item.description: score:-91 Chances: EQT’s acquisition of Equitrans Midstream for $5.5 billion unveils the CEO’s vision for AI-driven growth. Equitrans is the majority owner of a pipeline situated in one of the fastest growing AI data center hubs. The crypto exchange rose nearly 4%, as bitcoin notched another record high.
